post.author: pieisgood
post.body:
This is a WIP, just wanted to show you guys. Hope you like it.

any suggestions for further progress would be nice!!! texture, detail, anything!!!

http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v166/ ... ryhead.jpg
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v166/ ... yhead2.jpg

post.author: MBolus
post.body: So far pretty good. Consider changing pinna (external ear) size/shape, and the texture/shape of the mouth and see how that goes.

post.author: pieisgood
post.body:
update :O

fixed the lips, added some nice cavity shading, and tweaked other settings in the SSS arena.

http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v166/ ... yalien.jpg

post.author: Phobos
post.body:
It needs more texture, that's for sure, but you're doing an amazing job!

I want that ZBrush program so bad now >.<
